description:
[{'description': "Financing, Leasing and Extended Warranty available. Access to multiple lenders across the country. No Payments for 90 days on approved credit. Come see our showroom at 10 Baker Drive, Dartmouth NS B2W6K1

// ACCIDENT FREE!! //

Experience the perfect blend of efficiency and luxury with the 2019 Toyota RAV4 AWD Hybrid Limited, Leather, Sunroof, Heated seats. This accident-free SUV, verified by CARFAX Canada, boasts a sleek silver exterior and a refined black interior. With only 68,988 km on the odometer, this hybrid vehicle offers a smooth and eco-friendly driving experience.

FEATURES OF THE RAV4 AWD Hybrid Limited, Leather, Sunroof, Heated seats
--> Leather seats for a premium feel
--> Sunroof for an airy cabin
--> Heated seats for added comfort
--> Advanced AWD system for better traction

ADVANCED SAFETY FEATURES
--> Blind-spot monitoring for safer lane changes
--> Adaptive cruise control for relaxed driving
--> Lane departure alert with steering assist
--> Pre-collision system with pedestrian detection

PERFORMANCE AND EFFICIENCY
--> Hybrid engine for fuel efficiency
--> 2.5-litre engine for robust performance
--> Automatic transmission for smooth rides
--> Excellent fuel economy and low emissions

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE
--> Spacious interior for family trips
--> Dual-zone climate control for personalized comfort
--> Power liftgate for easy cargo access
--> Keyless entry and start for convenience

TECHNOLOGY AND CONNECTIVITY
--> Integrated navigation system for easy directions
--> Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free calls
--> Premium sound system for quality audio
--> Touchscreen display for intuitive control

CARGO SPACE
--> Ample cargo room for all your needs
--> Split-folding rear seats for extra space
--> Multiple storage compartments for organization
--> Convenient load floor for easy access

HYBRID VEHICLE FEATURES
--> Regenerative braking for energy recovery
--> EV mode for short electric-only trips
--> Reduced emissions for a greener drive
--> Lower fuel costs due to hybrid efficiency

WHAT OTHER OWNERS LIKE
--> Impressive fuel efficiency
--> Comfortable and spacious interior
--> Advanced safety features
--> Smooth and quiet hybrid performance

This 2019 Toyota RAV4 AWD Hybrid Limited, Leather, Sunroof, Heated seats's VIN is: 2T3DWRFV1KW045275. "}]

description:
[{'description': "
The 2018 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD is a versatile and practical compact SUV with an emphasis on reliability and all-weather capability. The LE trim offers a balanced set of features for a comfortable driving experience, while the all-wheel-drive (AWD) system provides enhanced traction and stability in various road conditions. Here's a detailed overview of the 2018 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD:
Performance	
Engine: 2.5-liter 4-cylinder engine.
	
Power: Approximately 176 horsepower and 172 lb-ft of torque.
	
Transmission: 6-speed automatic transmission.
	
Drivetrain: All-wheel drive (AWD).
	
Fuel Economy:			
City: Around 22 mpg.
		
Highway: Around 28 mpg.
		
Interior	
Seating: Five-passenger capacity.
	
Upholstery: Cloth seats.
	
Cargo Space: Approximately 38.4 cubic feet behind the rear seats and up to 73.4 cubic feet with the rear seats folded.
	
Rear Seat: 60/40 split-folding rear seats for flexible cargo and passenger space.
Technology	
Infotainment:			
7-inch touchscreen display.
		
Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration (available in later models or through updates).
		
Bluetooth connectivity.
		
	
Audio: Six-speaker sound system.
	
USB Ports: Multiple, including USB-A.
Safety	
Standard Safety Features:			
Toyota Safety Sense P (TSS-P) suite, which includes:					
Pre-Collision System: Detects potential collisions and applies brakes if necessary.
			
Lane Departure Warning: Alerts you if you drift out of your lane.
			
Lane Keeping Assist: Helps steer the vehicle to stay within its lane.
			
Adaptive Cruise Control: Maintains a set speed and adjusts to keep a safe distance from the car ahead.
			
Automatic High Beams: Automatically switches between high and low beams based on traffic conditions.
				
		
Rearview camera with dynamic guidelines.
		
Stability control and traction control.
		
Multiple airbags.
		
Comfort and Convenience	
Climate Control: Manual air conditioning.
	
Power Windows and Locks: Standard.
	
Keyless Entry: Standard.
	
Driver's Seat: Manual adjustments.
	
Steering Wheel: Tilt and telescoping with controls for audio and cruise.
Additional Features	
Wheels: 17-inch alloy wheels.
	
Exterior: LED daytime running lights, body-colored exterior mirrors, and a rear spoiler.
	
Interior: Height-adjustable driver's seat, a standard audio system with a touchscreen interface, and a durable cloth interior.

The 2018 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD is a practical choice for drivers needing reliable all-wheel drive for better handling in adverse conditions. With a focus on safety, comfort, and versatility, it's a solid option for families or anyone seeking a dependable compact SUV.
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]

[{'description': 'NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / Rearview Camera, Steering Assist, Pre Collision System  and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2023 Toyota RAV4 include:
 
Rearview Camera
Steering Assist
Pre Collision System
Automatic High Beam
Toyota Safety Sense 2.5
Lane Tracing Assist
Lane Departure Alert
Vehicle Stability Control
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 32241 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 18 months or 45,000km of warranty left.'}]

description:
[{'description': "Financing, Leasing and Extended Warranty available. Access to multiple lenders across the country. No Payments for 90 days on approved credit. Come see our showroom at 10 Baker Drive, Dartmouth NS B2W6K1

// ACCIDENT FREE!! //
// EXCELLENT CONDITION! //

Discover the epitome of reliability and efficiency with the 2023 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD, a pristine SUV that combines advanced technology with a sleek Silver Sky Metallic exterior and a stylish Black interior. With just 34,973 km on the odometer, this vehicle is primed to deliver a dynamic driving experience. Equipped with a robust 2.5 Litre Unleaded engine and smooth automatic transmission, this RAV4 is designed for both urban commutes and adventurous getaways.

ADVANCED SAFETY FEATURES:
--> Adaptive Cruise Control for safe travels
--> Comprehensive airbag system for protection
--> Rearview camera for effortless reversing
--> Enhanced stability and traction control

PERFORMANCE AND EFFICIENCY:
--> All-Wheel Drive for superior handling
--> 2.5 Litre engine for powerful performance
--> Fuel-efficient design for long journeys
--> Automatic transmission for smooth shifts

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE:
--> Spacious interior for passenger comfort
--> Climate control for optimal cabin temperature
--> Multi-adjustable driver's seat for perfect positioning
--> Power windows and locks for convenience

TECHNOLOGY AND CONNECTIVITY:
--> Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free use
--> Modern infotainment system for entertainment
--> USB ports for device charging and connectivity
--> Steering wheel-mounted controls for easy access

CARGO SPACE:
--> Generous cargo area for storage needs
--> 60/40 split-folding rear seats for versatility
--> Convenient cargo cover for privacy
--> Ample space for luggage and gear

WHAT OTHER OWNERS LIKE:
--> The RAV4's reputation for durability
--> Adaptive Cruise Control for relaxed highway driving
--> The seamless integration of technology
--> The comfort and spaciousness of the cabin

This 2023 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD, Adaptive Cruise Ctrl, Bluetooth, Clean!'s VIN is: 2T3B1RFV3PC348881. Presented by Jim Pattison Lease Halifax, this vehicle is a testament to Toyota's commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. Experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and technology with this exceptional RAV4. "}]

Tackle various road conditions confidently with the RAV4's dependable AWD system, providing excellent traction and stability in both urban and off-road environments. Maneuver with ease and enhance your safety with the integrated backup camera, offering a clear view of what?s behind you while reversing. Stay connected and hands-free with the Bluetooth system, allowing you to make calls, stream music, and access your favorite apps without taking your focus off the road. COME IN AND SEE THIS VEHICLE!! "}]

Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? The top features for this 2022 Toyota RAV4 include:
 
Trailer Sway Control

7 Touchscreen
Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
Engine Immobilizer
Heated Front Seats
Power Moonroof
USB ports
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 33884 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 10 months or 8,500km of warranty left.'}]

Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2022 Toyota RAV4 include:
 
JBL Premium Audio System
Navigation
Aux Input
Heated Front Seats
USB ports
Dual-Zone A/C
Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
Bluetooth
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 32090 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 8 months or 27,000km of warranty left.'}]

description:
[{'description': "
 
RAV4 Trail AWD with Heated & Cooled Leather Seats, and Apple Carplay!
 
This 2021 Toyota RAV4 Trail is equipped with a reliable 2.5L 4-Cylinder engine paired with an automatic transmission, providing a smooth and efficient driving experience. With 95,448 kilometers on the odometer, this vehicle has been well-maintained and is ready for its next adventure. The RAV4 Trail trim offers enhanced performance features, making it ideal for both city driving and off-road adventures.
 
Inside, the RAV4 Trail provides a spacious and comfortable cabin, with ample room for passengers and cargo. The seats are supportive and plush, ensuring a comfortable ride even on long journeys. The interior is well-designed, with high-quality materials and intuitive controls that are easy to use. Additionally, the RAV4 Trail comes equipped with a range of features including a touchscreen infotainment system, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and a suite of advanced safety technologies.
 
In conclusion, this 2021 Toyota RAV4 Trail is a versatile and capable SUV that offers a blend of performance, comfort, and technology. Whether you're commuting to work or exploring the great outdoors, this vehicle is sure to exceed your expectations. With its combination of reliability, comfort, and practicality, the RAV4 Trail is a top choice in the compact SUV segment.
 
Only $34,998 or $158/Wk Tax Inc. $0 Down! Contact us for more information!
 
Worry-Free Certified Vehicles offer Canada's best protection for both you and your vehicle including an Industry-Leading 170-point Mechanical and Cosmetic Inspection, and all Come with a Brand New 2-Year Motor Vehicle Inspection (MVI)! Our Worry-Free Certified Vehicles offer you A Better Used Vehicle, Period! Minimum of 6 Months Warranty for FREE, Satisfaction Guaranteed No Hassle 7-Day Exchange. We work with all Lenders to ensure you get the BEST financing rates. FREE CarFax History Report with all vehicles! *PROTECT YOURSELF!!! DO NOT PURCHASE A PRE-OWNED VEHICLE WITHOUT A CARFAX REPORT, THE ONLY CANADIAN HISTORY REPORT ON THE MARKET*
 
***With the HUGE influx of New Arrivals, certain vehicles may not be ready or have pictures yet. Feel free to send us an email and we will be glad to let you know the status of the vehicle you're interested in and send you any additional information needed to offer you a seamless transaction!!!***
 
It is the purchaser's responsibility to personally verify year, make, model, mileage, options and any remaining or extended warranty prior to purchasing this vehicle. Although many of our Worry-Free Certified vehicles have multiple sets of keys, a minimum of 1 key can be guaranteed with our pre-loved units. Convenient and Quick On-Site Financing Offering the Lowest Applicable Rates - Regardless of credit, we have access to lenders that can help! FREE No Obligation Pre-Approvals within 2 hours from the Comfort of Your Home!! Apply Online.
 
Communities Served: In N.B.: Fredericton, Saint John, Moncton, Quispamsis, Rothesay, Hampton, Sussex, Oromocto, New Maryland, Saint Andrews, Saint Stephen, Woodstock, Grand Falls, Edmundston, Campbellton, Dalhousie, Bathurst, Miramichi, Richibucto, Bouctouche, Cocagne, Shediac, Memramcook, Sackville, and everywhere in between! description:
[{'description': "Financing, Leasing and Extended Warranty available. Access to multiple lenders across the country. No Payments for 90 days on approved credit. Come see our showroom at 10 Baker Drive, Dartmouth NS B2W6K1

// SINGLE OWNER! //
// ACCIDENT FREE!! //
// EXCELLENT CONDITION! //

Introducing the 2023 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD, a vehicle that combines style, comfort, and advanced technology to deliver a driving experience that is both exhilarating and secure. Finished in a sleek silver exterior and complemented by a sophisticated black interior, this SUV is a testament to Toyota's commitment to quality. With just 37,515 km on the odometer, this RAV4 LE AWD is poised to offer its next owner the same reliability and performance that has become synonymous with the Toyota brand.

ADVANCED SAFETY FEATURES:
--> Toyota Safety Sense 2.0 suite included
--> Pre-Collision System with Pedestrian Detection
--> Lane Departure Alert with Steering Assist
--> Full-Speed Range Dynamic Radar Cruise Control

PERFORMANCE AND EFFICIENCY:
--> 2.5 Litre engine offering robust performance
--> All-Wheel Drive (AWD) for superior traction
--> Automatic transmission for smooth shifting
--> Unleaded fuel efficiency for cost-effective driving

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE:
--> Air Conditioning (A/C) for optimal climate control
--> Spacious seating for up to five passengers
--> Multi-adjustable front seats for personalized comfort
--> Power windows and door locks for convenience

TECHNOLOGY AND CONNECTIVITY:
--> Adaptive Cruise Control for hassle-free long drives
--> Advanced infotainment system with touchscreen
--> Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free phone use
--> Comprehensive audio system with AM/FM radio

CARGO SPACE:
--> Generous cargo area for storage needs
--> 60/40 split-folding rear seats for versatility
--> Ample space for luggage and gear
--> Convenient cargo area lighting

WHAT OTHER OWNERS LIKE:
--> Dependable All-Wheel Drive system
--> Intuitive Adaptive Cruise Control feature
--> The balance of efficiency and power in the engine
--> Comfortable and well-designed interior space

This 2023 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD, A/C, Adaptive Cruise Ctrl's VIN is: 2T3B1RFVXPC351339. Discover the perfect blend of capability and luxury in this exceptional SUV, available now at Jim Pattison Lease Halifax. "}]

description: [{'description': 'We serve Maritimers in all types of credit situations. If you\'ve had a "financial bump in the road", ask us how our Plan B program can help you to rebuild your credit and get back behind the steering wheel with a great Bob Allen\'s car or truck. Ask for Lorraine, our Financial Specialist. She has been personally helping Maritime car buyers with financing and credit solutions for over 35 years, and she knows how to get you the best deal and rates on your financing (whether you are in a bad credit situation, or a good credit situation!).  Most importantly, have confidence that Bob Allen\'s works with all major banks and lenders to ensure you get the best rates on your financing. We want to help you work through your tough credit situation, but we also can help you take advantage of good or great credit standing and enjoy the best possible lending rates.  Bob Allen\'s is a family run dealership and has been serving Atlantic Canadians for over 50 years. We are a used car dealership that you can trust, and we pride ourselves on service after the sale. '}]

description:
[{'description': "The 2018 Toyota RAV4 XLE is a versatile and reliable compact SUV that combines practicality with comfort. This vehicle boasts a fuel-efficient 2.5L 4-cylinder engine, ensuring you get excellent mileage whether you're commuting or taking long road trips. The RAV4 XLE comes equipped with a suite of advanced safety features, including Toyota Safety Sense, which offers pre-collision warning, lane departure alert, and adaptive cruise control, providing peace of mind on every journey.

Inside, the spacious cabin comfortably seats five and offers a wealth of amenities such as a power moonroof, dual-zone climate control, and an intuitive Entune infotainment system with a 6.1-inch touchscreen, Bluetooth connectivity, and integrated backup camera. The rear cargo space is roomy, with a low lift-over height making loading and unloading a breeze.

For those who appreciate a smooth and confident ride, the RAV4 XLE features all-wheel drive capabilities, handling various terrains and weather conditions effortlessly. With its blend of reliability, advanced safety features, and comfort-oriented design, the 2018 Toyota RAV4 XLE is an excellent choice for families, adventurers, and anyone seeking a dependable and stylish vehicle. "}]

description: [{'description': "Our versatile 2020 Toyota RAV4 XLE AWD in Super White inspires you to seek out adventure every day! Powered by a 2.5 Liter Dynamic Force 4 Cylinder generating 203hp paired with an 8 Speed Direct Shift Automatic transmission with ECO and Sport modes so you can pick your own kind of performance. Nimble and easy to maneuver, this All Wheel Drive SUV is also efficient enough to score nearly approximately 7.1L/100km on the highway. Our popular RAV4 adds rugged good looks, too, with LED lighting, fog lamps, 17-inch alloy wheels, dual chrome exhaust outlets, and a rear spoiler for a sporty finish.Our XLE cabin encourages you to take command of each day with supportive fabric seats, eight-way power for the driver, a multifunction steering wheel, dual-zone climate control, and high-tech benefits that are anchored by an Entune infotainment system. With that, you're treated to a 7-inch touchscreen, a six-speaker sound system, voice recognition, and an impressive range of connectivity choices that include Android Auto, Apple CarPlay, Bluetooth, WiFi compatibility, and Amazon Alexa compatibility.Toyota's sophisticated Safety Sense 2.0 technology gives a boost to your peace of mind with adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assistance, and automatic braking to go with ABS, airbags, and a backup camera. Enjoy bold style for every mile in our RAV4 XLE! Low Hassle Pricing means that you dont have to be an expert negotiator to get a good, fair deal on your next used vehicle. Most of our customers have said that getting a fair price upfront is more important than the ability to negotiate the price when they are choosing where to buy a used vehicle. Low Hassle Pricing means that we have done our research and we are confident that we are well positioned in the marketplace. Here at Harvard Auto, we offer the best quality vehicles and service in the industry. We offer Free CARFAX vehicle history reports on all our vehicles. We have the best credit specialists always available! Better than bank rate financing! Excellent reviews on Facebook and Google.Cash prices shown Exclude HST, Administration and Licensing Fees. We make every reasonable attempt to ensure options are correct but please verify with your sales professional as mistakes can happen. We cant guarantee 2 keys with every vehicle.Happy to serve customers in Halifax, Dartmouth, Bedford, Lower Sackville, Truro, Sydney, Kentville, Yarmouth, Amherst, New Glasgow, Bridgewater, Digby, Baddeck, Tatamagouche, Canso, New Minas, Lunenburg, Pugwash, Windsor, Musquodoboit, Charlottetown, Summerside, Cavendish, Rustico.. "}]

description:
[{'description': "Financing, Leasing and Extended Warranty available. Access to multiple lenders across the country. No Payments for 90 days on approved credit. Come see our showroom at 10 Baker Drive, Dartmouth NS B2W6K1

// ACCIDENT FREE!! //

// SINGLE OWNER! //

// EXCELLENT CONDITION! //

Discover the 2023 Toyota RAV4 Limited AWD, a sophisticated SUV with a silver exterior and black leather interior. This vehicle offers luxury with heated/cooled seats and a sunroof. With only 16,369 km on the odometer, this RAV4 is ready for new adventures.

FEATURES OF THE RAV4 Limited AWD, Leather, Heated/Cooled Seats, Sunroof
--> Heated/cooled leather seats
--> Panoramic sunroof
--> Advanced AWD system
--> Premium audio system

ADVANCED SAFETY FEATURES
--> Blind spot monitoring
--> Adaptive cruise control
--> Lane departure alert
--> Rear cross-traffic alert

PERFORMANCE AND EFFICIENCY
--> 2.5-litre unleaded engine
--> Automatic transmission
--> Excellent fuel efficiency
--> Smooth and responsive handling

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE
--> Dual-zone climate control
--> Power-adjustable front seats
--> Keyless entry and start
--> Heated steering wheel

TECHNOLOGY AND CONNECTIVITY
--> Touchscreen infotainment system
--> Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
--> Bluetooth connectivity
--> USB charging ports

CARGO SPACE
--> Spacious rear cargo area
--> Foldable rear seats
--> Multiple storage compartments
--> Easy access power liftgate

WHAT OTHER OWNERS LIKE
--> Comfortable and luxurious interior
--> Advanced safety features
--> Smooth driving experience
--> Efficient fuel consumption

This 2023 Toyota RAV4 Limited AWD, Leather, Heated/Cooled Seats, Sunroof's VIN is: 2T3D1RFV1PC361816. "}]

description:
[{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / 7 Display Screen, Dual-Zone A/C, Dynamic Radar Cruise Control and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2019 Toyota RAV4 include:
 
7 Display Screen
Dual-Zone A/C
Dynamic Radar Cruise Control
Smart Key System
Pre-Collision System
Push Button Start
USB Port
Heated Steering Wheel
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 34370 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

description:
[{'description': "
Are you ready to experience the perfect blend of efficiency, reliability, and versatility? Look no further! This 2021 Toyota RAV4 LE Hybrid AWD is the SUV you've been waiting for.


Key Highlights:

160 Point Inspection on All Pre-Owned Inventory: Prioritize quality and reliability with our comprehensive 160-point inspection, guaranteeing that every aspect of the vehicle meets our stringent standards for your satisfaction.

One Owner Vehicle: Benefit from the confidence of owning a vehicle with a single owner, reflecting its well-maintained history and low wear and tear.

Fresh MVI (Motor Vehicle Inspection) on All Units: Drive with peace of mind knowing that this vehicle has undergone a fresh MVI, meeting all safety and performance standards to ensure your safety on the road.


 Key Features:

Hybrid Efficiency: Enjoy exceptional fuel economy with Toyota's proven hybrid technology.

All-Wheel Drive: Conquer any terrain and drive confidently in all weather conditions.

Advanced Safety: Equipped with Toyota Safety Sense 2.0, including pre-collision system, lane departure alert, and adaptive cruise control.

Modern Tech: Stay connected with a 7-inch touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and Amazon Alexa compatibility.

Heated Front Seats: Stay warm and comfortable during colder drives with heated front seats, ensuring a cozy ride for you and your passengers.

Dual Zone Climate Control: Allows both the driver and passengers to find the perfect temperature.


Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this fantastic vehicle. Contact us to schedule your test drive and see for yourself why the 2021 Toyota RAV4 LE Hybrid AWD is the ideal choice for your next adventure!
 "}]

description: [{'description': "Features & Highlights Engine: 2.5L 4-Cylinder DOHC Sound System: 7-inch Touchscreen Audio System with 6 Speakers Safety: Toyota Safety Sense 2.0 (TSS 2.0) Upholstery: Premium Cloth Seating Additional: All-Wheel Drive, Apple CarPlay & Android Auto, Rearview Camera, Bluetooth Connectivity, LED Headlights, Adaptive Cruise Control  Vehicle Overview The 2021 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD is designed to provide a reliable and comfortable driving experience, blending advanced technology with practical features. Powered by a 2.5L 4-Cylinder DOHC engine, this SUV offers robust performance while maintaining excellent fuel efficiency. The 7-inch touchscreen audio system with 6 speakers ensures a high-quality sound experience, making every journey enjoyable.  Safety is paramount in the RAV4 LE, with Toyota Safety Sense 2.0 (TSS 2.0) offering a comprehensive suite of advanced safety features, including Pre-Collision System with Pedestrian Detection, Lane Departure Alert with Steering Assist, and Adaptive Cruise Control. These features are designed to enhance driver confidence and ensure the safety of all passengers.  The interior is outfitted with premium cloth seating, providing comfort for both short commutes and long trips. Key features such as Apple CarPlay and Android Auto allow for seamless smartphone integration, making it easy to access apps, navigation, and media on the go. The rearview camera enhances safety by simplifying parking and reversing maneuvers. Bluetooth connectivity facilitates hands-free calls and audio streaming, while LED headlights ensure excellent visibility in various driving conditions.  Why Buy From Vehicle Approval Centre? Tailored Financing Options: We offer a range of financing solutions to accommodate all credit types, ensuring you can secure your RAV4 LE AWD with ease. 360-Degree Online Viewing: Explore the Toyota RAV4 LE AWD in full detail with our online viewing tool, allowing you to appreciate its features and design from the comfort of your home. Delivery Across Atlantic Canada: Choose your vehicle, and we'll deliver it directly to your location, ensuring a smooth and convenient purchase process. The 2021 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD combines practicality, advanced safety, and modern technology, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a versatile and reliable SUV. "}]

description: [{'description': "Discover excellence behind the wheel of our 2022 Toyota RAV4 LE AWD in White! Motivated by a 2.5 Litre Dynamic Force 4 Cylinder delivering 203hp matched with an 8 Speed Direct Shift Automatic transmission. This All Wheel Drive SUV also offers terrain management, nimble handling, and the ability to achieve approximately 6.9L/100km on the highway. Bold lines and a dramatic grille set the tone for RAV4 styling, while LED lighting, chrome exhaust outlets, and a rear spoiler add a touch of sporty sophistication. Our LE cabin will meet your daily needs and then some with comfortable heated fabric seats, a multifunction steering wheel, a filtered climate-control system, keyless entry, a 4.2-inch driver display, and technology for staying ahead of your busy days with ease. A 7-inch touchscreen and voice control help you connect at will with your choice of Android Auto, Apple CarPlay, WiFi compatibility, Bluetooth, and Amazon Alexa compatibility. The six-speaker sound system lets you listen to your favorite tunes or talk, too. Toyota Safety Sense technology helps take care of you as you explore your world with a backup camera, adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assistance, forward collision warning, automatic braking, pedestrian detection, and more. Roomy and versatile, our RAV4 LE is a daily driver that can do a lot more! Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership! Steele Chevrolet Atlantic Canada's Premier Pre-Owned Super Center. Being a GM Certified Pre-Owned vehicle ensures this unit has been fully inspected fully detailed serviced up to date and brought up to Certified standards. Market value priced for immediate delivery and ready to roll so if this is your next new to your vehicle do not hesitate. You've dealt with all the rest now get ready to deal with the BEST! Steele Chevrolet Buick GMC Cadillac ********** Metros' Premier Credit Specialist Team Good/Bad/New Credit? Divorce? Self-Employed? "}]

description:
[{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / Rearview Camera, Heated Seats, Apple CarPlay and more!
 
All Clutch cars include a free MVI, 10-day money-back guarantee, and to-your-door delivery. Purchases can be completed 100% online.
 
Delivery to NS, PEI, and East of Fredericton!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2019 Toyota RAV4 include:
 
Rearview Camera
Heated Seats
Apple CarPlay
Android Auto
Power Mirrors
Drive Modes
Automatic High Beams
60/40 Split Rear Seats
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will come pick it up.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Free 90-Day Protection Plan, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling, hard sells, or hidden fees.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable) or government licensing fees. Listed price is applicable only if you finance through Clutch. Cash Processing Fee of 3.5% applies to cash purchases. Vehicle location is not customer-facing. The vehicle can be viewed in person at the time of delivery. Please call us for more details.
 
Stock # 20450 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

description:
[{'description': "Steele Hyundai MVI and Ride.  All MVI and Ride vehicles have been inspected and brought up to provincial motor vehicle inspection standards.  
We also change the oil as part of our process to get this vehicle ready for you.
Warranty:  There is a 30-day 50/50 split warranty on parts and labor on any motor vehicle inspection items. 
Please note items such as air conditioning & engine lights are not MVI related items.
TRADE INS ARE WELCOME.

BRAND NEW MVI
NEW WINDSHIELD
COMPLETED LUBE,OIL AND FILTER
replaced battery
WIPER BLADES REPLACED
REPLACED AIR FILTER
REPLACED CABIN AIR FILTER
replaced front pads and rotors - caliper service performed - all brackets and slider pins cleaned and lubricated
rear brake service performed - all pads, brackets and slider pins cleaned and lubricated
found front cable to be stretched - replaced cable and adjusted parking brake - confirmed proper operation
both control arms replaced

The 2018 Toyota RAV4 Limited is a well-equipped compact SUV that offers a combination of reliability, comfort, and versatility. Here's an overview of its features:

Engine: The RAV4 Limited typically comes with a 2.5-liter four-cylinder engine paired with a six-speed automatic transmission. This engine provides a good balance of power and fuel efficiency for daily driving.

Performance: The RAV4 offers a smooth and comfortable ride, with responsive handling that makes it easy to maneuver in various driving conditions. The Limited trim may also come with additional features like a sport-tuned suspension for a slightly more engaging driving experience.

Interior: Inside, the RAV4 Limited offers a spacious and well-appointed cabin with seating for up to five passengers. The seats are comfortable and supportive, and the interior materials are of high quality. The Limited trim may come with leather upholstery and other upscale features for added comfort and convenience.

Technology: Toyota equips the RAV4 with a range of standard and optional technology features, including a touchscreen infotainment system, Bluetooth connectivity, USB ports, and available navigation system. The Limited trim typically includes additional features like a premium audio system, smartphone integration, and advanced driver assistance systems.

Safety: Standard safety features on the RAV4 Limited may include antilock brakes, stability and traction control, front side airbags, side curtain airbags, a rearview camera, and Toyota's suite of advanced safety technologies, such as forward collision warning, automatic emergency braking, lane departure warning, and more.

Cargo Space: The RAV4 offers ample cargo space for its class, with a versatile cargo area that can accommodate groceries, luggage, or other cargo with ease. The rear seats can also be folded down to create even more space when needed.

Overall, the 2018 Toyota RAV4 Limited is a reliable and practical choice for buyers seeking a compact SUV with a comfortable ride, plenty of features, and strong safety ratings. "}]
